name.tooltip: This is the Wrapper Keyword name. Katana will save this Wrapper Keyword with the name provided in this field
name.bantip: No integer value accepted. No spaces or special characters but for the exception of underscores, hyphens, and periods

dvname.tooltip: Select the Product Driver from the list of Product Drivers available to you.

file.tooltip: ActionFile Path respective to the above Selected driver would be populated here.
file.protip: The selected path is the file path, wherein the Wrapper keyword will be saved.

desc.tooltip: This indicates the Description of Wrapper Keyword.

driver.tooltip: Select the Product Driver from the list of Product Drivers available to you.

keyword.protip: ProTip: Unsure what this keyword does? Select it and the documentation for it would appear on the side.

steparg.tooltip: These are all the arguments accepted by the keyword above.
steparg.protip: ProTip: If you want to know which arguments are mandatory and which are not or if you want to know the default value of the non-mandatory arguments, you can go through the signature of the keyword in the signature and comment section.
steparg.snowflake: If you can't see anything here, you probably have not selected a keyword.

deletestep.tooltip: Click this to delete this subkeyword.

editstep.tooltip: Click this to edit this subkeyword.
editstep.snowflake: You can edit only one subkeyword at a time.

insertstep.tooltip: Click this to insert a subkeyword below
